title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Enabled push protection (`hasPushProtection: true`) for Databricks, Heroku Postgres, Onfido, Paddle, Pineapple Technologies, Pinecone, Rainforest, and Weights & Biases tokens.
Activated private repository support (`isPrivateWithGhas: true`) for Limbar, Proof, Supabase (all variants), and Vercel (all variants) tokens.
Changes applied identically to both FPT and GHEC secret scanning pattern documentation files.
summary:
- Enabled push protection (`hasPushProtection: true`) for Databricks, Heroku Postgres, Onfido, Paddle, Pineapple Technologies, Pinecone, Rainforest, and Weights & Biases tokens.
- Activated private repository support (`isPrivateWithGhas: true`) for Limbar, Proof, Supabase (all variants), and Vercel (all variants) tokens.
- Changes applied identically to both FPT and GHEC secret scanning pattern documentation files.
generated_title: Enable push protection and private GHAS support for multiple secret types
commits: **c7d223b**: Merge pull request #59038 from github/repo-sync (by docs-bot)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Enabled push protection (`hasPushProtection: true`) for Databricks, Heroku Postgres, Onfido, Paddle, Pineapple Technologies, Pinecone, Rainforest, and Weights & Biases tokens.
- Activated private repository support (`isPrivateWithGhas: true`) for Limbar, Proof, Supabase (all variants), and Vercel (all variants) tokens.
- Changes applied identically to both FPT and GHEC secret scanning pattern documentation files.

### Title
Enable push protection and private GHAS support for multiple secret types
